transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan, good morning, ma'am. Shriman baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan, bolo sir.

Executive: Haan, ma'am, aapne kal call kiya tha na, aapke jo issue tha aapke regarding. Hmm hmm, call back kiya aapko. Haan ji, bataiye ma'am.

Customer: Achcha, batane ke liye kuch nahi sir. Ek lead bhi nahi aaya. Uske alava mere ko har din ek call aata IndiaMART se. Ye product tumhara sell karega kya? Ye wala tumhara category mein hai kya? Achcha, kitna baar bol chuka hun, hum UPVC hardware karke hi deal karta hun. UPVC hardware mein kaun sa material aata hai usse hi deal karta hun. Uske alava kuch nahi deal karta hun. Itna baar bolne ke baad bhi teen mahine ke baad bhi ye product tum bech sakte kya? Aise puchne ke liye kya matlab hai? Ek lead, main bol raha hun, fake lead bhi nahi aaya mere ko. Ek fake lead bhi nahi aaya. Uske alava har din IndiaMART se call aata. Ye wala product tum log deal karte kya? Hum log nahi deal karte, UPVC hardware hi deal karte hain.

Executive: Thik hai, thik hai, main samajh gaya. Main ek kaam karta hun, main aapko na ek link bhejta hun video meet se, aap join kijiye. And yahan se hum aapki mapping check kar lenge, thik hai na aap?

Customer: Haan, thik hai.

Executive: Main aapko ek link bhejta hun video meet ka. Achcha, bataiye mujhe aap join kis se karenge video meet? Mobile se bhi, desktop se?

Customer: Haan, mobile se.

Executive: Mobile se. Okay, wait. Abhi call back karte hain, main aapko link bhejta hun, thik hai?

Customer: Haan, abhi, abhi nahi hoga, 2:00 baje ko hoga.

Executive: Abhi nahi kar payenge?

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Ma'am, abhi join nahi kar payenge video meet?

Customer: Kya? Kaise?

Executive: Ma'am, abhi aap join nahi kar payenge video meet?

Customer: Abhi, abhi to nahi hoga. At least you know, 30 minutes to lagega hi lagega.

Executive: To phir main ek ghante baad kar loon? 11:00 baje kar loon? 11:00 baje?

Customer: Haan, haan, 11:00 baje, 11:00 baje kar do.

Executive: 11:00 baje kar loon phir?

Customer: Haan, haan, 11:00 baje ko call kar do.

Executive: Thik hai, chalo phir 11:00 baje kar do, thik hai ma'am?

Customer: Hmm, to isme mere ko kya dikhayega sir, exactly?

Executive: Dekhiye, isme aapki jo mapping hai, aapne jo bataya ki aap UPVC mein deal karti hai, PVC, thik hai, isme aapne deal kiya. To chalo uske regarding check karunga ki aapki jo mapping hai wo kis product mein ho rakhi hai, jiski vajah se isme remove kar denge, taki aapko irrelevancy na aaye.

Customer: Main already dekh chuka hun. Already video call mein bhi zyada se zyada chaar, chhe baar join kar raha hun. Wo mere ko main bola tha abhi, main kisi product udhar add kiya, usi, usi product se hum log deal karte hain. Uske alava kuch products mein deal nahi karte hain.

Executive: Sir, baki isme kuch filters vagaira bhi hote hain, kuch aapko search karne padte hain, vagaira bhi wo main aapko dikhata hun ma'am yahan pe. Lekin aapki problem solve ho jayegi, aap please nishchint rahiye ma'am.

Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai, main aap ek ghante ke baad call karo.

Executive: Okay, okay, thik hai. 11:00 baje ke aas paas.

Customer: Okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any leads.

- Receiving irrelevant calls from IndiaMART.

- Deals only in UPVC hardware.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet to check mapping.

- Agreed to reschedule the video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 11:00 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, upvc hardware, irrelevant calls, video meet
